abstract: Panorama Capital took the final step in its spin-off from former parent JPMorgan Chase, announcing Tuesday that it has closed a $240 million first independent fund to invest in life sciences and technology companies.
lead_paragraph: Panorama Capital took the final step in its spin-off from former parent JPMorgan Chase, announcing Tuesday that it has closed a $240 million first independent fund to invest in life sciences and technology companies.

headline.main: Panorama Closes First Fund Since JPMorgan Spin-Off

abstract: Boston officials on Tuesday unveiled a $4 million tax-incentive package to convince JPMorgan Chase to remain in Boston.
lead_paragraph: Boston officials on Tuesday unveiled a $4 million tax-incentive package to convince JPMorgan Chase to remain in Boston.

headline.main: Officials Seek to Keep JPMorgan in Boston

abstract: Though it has been widely reported that Bear Stearns will lay off about half of its 14,000 workers when it completes its acquisition by JPMorgan Chase, neither investment bank has offered specifics about who will stay and who will go.
lead_paragraph: Though it has been widely reported that Bear Stearns will lay off about half of its 14,000 workers when it completes its acquisition by JPMorgan Chase, neither investment bank has offered specifics about who will stay and who will go.

headline.main: At Bear, Letters Bring Good News and Bad
